attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

idinfo.datacred: Bureau of Ocean Energy ManagementFrank Pendleton: Frank.Pendleton@boem.govCenter for Geospatial Science and Technology, CSU NorthridgeDanielle Bram: danielle.bram@csun.eduhttps://csun.edu/cgst

descript.purpose: The Bureau of Ocean Energy Management (BOEM) collaborated with the Center for Geospatial Science and Technology (CGST) from 2020 to 2021 to generate a series of processed datasets to aid in renewable energy planning. Several variables important to offshore wind planning were summarized including wind speed, depth, slope, distance to shore etc. Datasets were summarized by BOEM aliquots, a 1200x1200 meter grid, covering the California, Oregon, and Washington coasts. In addition to a set of summarized attributes at the Aliquot Grid level, additional data deliverables were produced, such as processed reference data. All work was conducted in close cooperation with BOEM staff.
descript.abstract: BOEM - Morro Bay Call Area Extensions

citeinfo.origin: Bureau of Ocean Energy ManagementFrank Pendleton: Frank.Pendleton@boem.govCenter for Geospatial Science and Technology
